name: Mes Comptines
synopsis: Feel the beat and sing aloud! Introduce your toddler and preschooler to the world of rhythm and music game! Mes Comptines combines 17 all time favorite children songs in newly composed versions together with lively adorable 3D animations. Frolic full-featured music videos keep children entertained while enjoying the simple - yet addictive game play and alternately singing along these well-known kid tunes. Mes Comptines also helps children learn English vocabulary and enhance hand-and-ear coordination as they are taping along catchy rhythms. Features - 17 famous nursery rhymes with 3D-animated music videos! - All songs are uniquely composed and sung by professional singer - Easily to sing along with the karaoke-style lyrics - Enhancing hand-and-ear coordination of your little ones through simple game play - Cute and child-friendly artwork Kids Favorite Nursery Rhymes - L’alphabet - Ah les crocodiles - Fee-Fye le crapaud - Le fermier dans son pré - Savez-vous planter les choux ? - Am stram gram - L’araignée Gypsy - Pomme de Reinette - Frère Jacques - Promenons-nous dans les bois - Le vieux Mac Donald - Sur le pont d’Avignon - Elle descend de la montagne - J’aime la galette - Une souris verte - 1, 2, 3 nous irons au bois - Meunier, tu dors
